# Best found NC counties:

[65, 24, 84, 51, 77, 1, 56, 27, 53, 19, 23, 61, 62, 71, 20, 57, 33, 38, 12, 2, 69, 72, 73, 67, 74, 91, 9, 7, 39, 100, 40, 6, 30, 96, 83, 78, 80, 89, 88, 63, 31, 94, 58, 14, 25, 41, 64, 8, 60, 92, 3, 54, 59, 55, 76, 81, 5, 44, 50, 82, 95, 29, 16, 32, 42, 36, 13, 47, 21, 66, 34, 68, 70, 43, 22, 52, 85, 37, 35, 46, 11, 15, 48, 87, 97, 18, 17, 10, 49, 93, 79, 99, 4, 90, 75, 26, 86, 45, 28, 98, 65]

using Random

Random.seed!(2024)
randtour(n) = (tour = randperm(n); push!(tour, tour[1]))

nruns = 1000
rᵒ, TCᵒ = nothing, Inf
for i = 1:nruns
    r, TC = twoopt(randtour(nrow(df)), rTCh)
    if TC < TCᵒ
        rᵒ, TCᵒ = r, TC
        println(i, ": ", TCᵒ)
    end
end

1: 2244.4562545646195
2: 2239.234111221034
5: 2206.2988301209016
8: 2193.59127803764
14: 2171.6384056131983
35: 2150.95477387751
58: 2141.2129756166273
786: 2136.6754792497613
